Bring to a boil and cook until carrots are tender and water has mostly evaporated. what do I need to discard once I have removed the dish from the oven? thyme what should I reduce the temperature to? to 350°f How do I prepare the mushrooms for the Duxelles? Place mushrooms in the work bowl of a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped, scraping down sides with a rubber spatula as necessary, 8 to 10 short pulses. what do I need to do with the oil? heat how long do the mushrooms need cooking for? about 12 minutes how long do I cook after I've added the garlic? about 1 minute What should I do after adding soy sauce and bourbon to the skillet? Cook until almost dry, about 2 minutes. Add breadcrumbs and stir to combine. Transfer mixture to a bowl. How do I prepare the bacon mushrooms before adding them to the bowl with duxelles? toss bacon mushrooms with maple syrup until thoroughly coated I need to add tarragon chives and what else? half of parsley, and chervil What is the process of making the mixture homogeneous? fold mixture together until homogenous. I need to add parsley tarragon chives and what else? chervil what should I season it with? salt I need to add salt and what else? pepper How should I chop the cashews? Pulse until finely chopped, scraping down sides with a rubber spatula as necessary, 8 to 10 short pulses. What should I do with the beans after I have spread them on the baking sheet? Transfer to oven and roast, stirring occasionally, until beans are mostly split open and outer skins are beginning to get crunchy. how long must I roast them for? about 35 minutes What do I do with the beans after they are roasted? Transfer mixture to the work bowl of a food processor and set aside. what should I put the mixture into? work bowl what should I adjust the temperature on? oven What is the required cooking technique for the shiitake mushrooms? Cook, stirring frequently, until moisture evaporates and mushrooms are beginning to brown, about 12 minutes. how long should I cook it for? about 12 minutes Ok. what's next? Add leeks and celery and cook, stirring frequently, until softened, about 4 minutes. what do I need to put it into? food processor work bowl what should I add as well as pepper? salt How can I prepare the dried beans and mushroom mixture for this recipe? Process dried beans and mushroom mixture until roughly chopped, scraping down sides with a rubber spatula as necessary, 8 to 10 short pulses. That's done. What's next? Transfer to bowl with cashews. what should I use to scrape down the sides? rubber spatula what should I transfer the seeds into? bowl What comes after moving the processed sunflower seeds and pumpkin seeds to the food processor? Pulse until roughly chopped, scraping down sides with a rubber spatula as necessary, 8 to 10 short pulses. I should add the palsy tarragon chives and what else? chervil What should I do after adding the remaining parsley, tarragon, chives, and chervil? Fold together. I'm not sure how to incorporate the herbs into the mixture. Could you guide me? Add remaining parsley, tarragon, chives, and chervil to mixture and fold together. I should season it with pepper and what? salt i should add half of what of the mixture? cup What should I do with the single sheet of phyllo? Lay a single sheet of phyllo on a clean work surface and brush with olive oil. What should I use to avoid the phyllo sheets from drying out? Make sure to keep remaining phyllo covered with plastic wrap to avoid drying out. How should I prepare the phyllo and stuffing? Roll the phyllo and stuffing up like a burrito, tucking in the sides about half way through rolling. After rolling the filling in the phyllo, what should I do next? Set the cigar-shaped roll aside. What should I do between laying each phyllo sheet? Brush each phyllo sheet with olive oil as you layer them. How do I properly stack phyllo sheets? Lay a clean sheet of phyllo on your work surface and brush with olive oil. Lay two more sheets on top, brushing each with olive oil as you layer them. spread half of the what? mushroom lay what in? roasted carrots How can I arrange the carrots on the phyllo sheet? Lay roasted carrots in even, parallel rows in the mushrooms What do I do with the phyllo sheet? Roll the phyllo sheet up into a tight cylinder and set aside. How can I ensure even distribution of the bean/cashew mixture on the baking sheet?
target_answer: Press down firmly all over the baking sheet to spread mixture into a thin, even layer.
generated_answer: Cook, stirring frequently with a wooden spoon, until kale is completely wilted and covered with ice.
